headline: Activist Elliott grows stake in Equinix, holds talks with company
summary: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has a large investment in data center operator Equinix and has increased its stake in the last weeks, a person familiar with the matter said on Monday, after the company's stock price tumbled last month.  The hedge fund, which has made a string of profitable technology investments including bets on Salesforce, Texas Instruments and Hewlett Packard Enterprise, has been holding discussions with Equinix, said the person, who was not permitted to discuss the private talks publicly.  Neither Elliott's exact demands for the company nor the exact size of the stake could be learned.
